features: Omnidirectional dual WiFi antenna; Dual band 2.4GHz and 5.8GHz; Support 802.11 b/g/n/ac/ax/wifi 6

Application: wireless network router,PCI PCIe network card, built-in wifi motherboard, notebook PC desktop computer external USB network adapter, WLAN AP & Hotspot wireless range extender,security cameras
Improve Signal Strength: help WiFi devices to have a faster speed and stable connection, get no network drops when using multiple devices simultaneously
Extend Bluetooth Range:improve coverage and reception stability for your Bluetooth devices, like Bluetooth headphones,headset,wireless controllers,Bluetooth network card,etc
Long Cords & Magnetic Base:the 6.5ft extension cable allows you move the antenna to a better signal pickup position; and the strong magnet support the base mounted vertically onto a steel surface
Note: To get the best signal possible, we recommend trying to place the antenna in different locations and adjusting the 2 stubs in multiple angles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequency: dual band 2.4GHz 5GHz 5.8GHz Gain: 8dBi VSWR: <2.0 Polarization: Linear Vertical Direction: Omnidirectional Impedance: 50 ohms Connector: dual RP-SMA connectors Extension Cable: RG174, 6.5 feet Antenna Height: 8 inches In Compliance with: 802.11 b/g/n/ac/ax/wifi 6 Package Includes: 1pc Dual WiFi RP-SMA Antenna

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big connection improvement!
reviews.reviewText: Got this external antenna so I could mount it to my desk after my original wifi card antenna broke. This antenna was a big upgrade to my connection and was worth the money. The magnetic base also proves helpful if you have a metal desk frame or other metal surface on your desk. Great connectivity, great usability, easy to install!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works as intended and fast and stable internet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful in electrically noisy locations.
reviews.reviewText: I have PC in a rack-mounted case, which puts the back end inside a metal box full of electronics. No or poor signal. Using the built in magnet, I put this on the top of the rack and ran the cord down to the PC four feet below. The cables have the correct ends, no adapter required. Went up to full signal strength. The magnet and long cord are the best parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product really great, we share connection with our landlord and have internet issues for awhile. Works wonders for a pc.Magnets are really strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solved my weak signal problem
reviews.reviewText: My desktop in the corner of the house in the basement, while the router is in the middle of the house. While I get coverage throughout the house, my desktop with its antenna near the outside wall of the house had weak signal and would occasionally lag in games (or even disconnect on rare occasions).Today before replacing my stock motherboard antennas with this one, I ran the following from cmd command line: netsh wlan show interfacesIt showed signal strength of 72%After replacing with this antenna, I am seeing 99% (and faster transmit/receive speed by about 40%)Positioning of the moving parts is important, as depending on how I position them I can get worse signal then before, same, slightly better or the near perfect one. What works best for me is both of them straight up.The magnet felt kind of weak on a nearby metal item I had but feels very strong on my PC case.I would recommend based on my experience (and will update after I use it for longer if that changes).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on z790
reviews.reviewText: At 2AM one day, I managed to break the original WIFI antenna for a Asus ROG Strix z790E motherboard. While I was able to re-solder the connectors (using a microscope and a very fine soldering tip), the original design is much too fragile and the cable too short.The Eightwood seems to be bit more robust and works at least as well as the original -- in fact, it seems to be better as it gives rx/tx speeds of 866/866 (Mbps) very reliably. No doubt this is partly because it has a longer cable which allows better positioning options. It may also be on account of having two antennae. If nothing else having the longer cable diminishes the likelihood of stressing the connectors to failure.I am replacing all of the antennae on all my systems.It's good, buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instantly 3x my wifi speed
reviews.reviewText: I removed my small stub antennas from my PC and installed this. My PC is on the floor so I got this in order to place it higher up, on my desk for better signal. It immediately tripled my download speed, and I never have bluetooth lag or disconnect issues anymore. Sometimes you get a product that genuinely excites you with how well it works and how ltitle it costs, and this is one of them for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Moved my PC from the top of my desk to underneath it and started getting bluetooth disconnects pretty badly. This screwed in perfectly to my MSI Tomahawk b650 wifi and works perfectly. No more disconnects.
Good replacement for my factory WiFi Antenna. Works well and has nothing to complain about it. Does what it does.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works very well Signal does whole House
reviews.reviewText: Works very well Signal does whole House this product fix my problem as my pc upstairs and wanted to use my xbox elite 2 gamepad Downstairs and with this product it works flawlessly Recommend this product if your using steam link app on your TV downstairs and want to use your xbox one elite 2 contoler to play on TV

My router is about 30 feet away from my PC. The stock antenna's (MSI Tomahawk B650 MB WiFi 6) were giving a full signal but only a ⅓ of my max internet speed (under 100 Mbps). After hooking up this new antenna my speeds tripled and at over 320 Mbps which is maximum speed (Telus internet 300). Overall an great, high quality product and highly recommended!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy setup, and great range as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Device works amazingly well. Great extended range on the bluetooth and wifi. Easiest setup going

Replaced my factory gigabyte one from my motherboard, and this easily boosted my speeds from my starlink router, the cord is nice and long, and of a thicker gauge, which is a bonus, magnetic bottom, heavy and solid feeling.Highly recommend if your far away from your router and wanna replace your motherboards included ones.
